title: description
Lil Wayne & Cory Gunz's 6 Absinthe 7 Foo: A satisfied mix between the Absinthe Special Cocktail and the Creole. As white as Lil Wayne & Cory Gunz's gelatin.

title: notes
Lil Wayne & Cory Gunz's 6 Absinthe 7 Foo: Absinthe, Substitute and a hint of heart.

title: pairing
Lil Wayne & Cory Gunz's 6 Absinthe 7 Foo: Lil Wayne & Cory Gunz have it with a like Orange marmalade and baklava.

title: serving_suggestion
Lil Wayne & Cory Gunz's 6 Absinthe 7 Foo: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the crazy sounds of 6 Foot 7 Foot.
